snippet.title: Murder Next Room Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Playtest is now OPEN!

Steam Store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2158210/Murder_Next_Room/

As you exit your room, you observe that the Manor is very quiet and there are no other guests in sight. While searching for them, someone has just turned off the lights. Would you rather go alone and fix them or hide?
